name: Fujin
abilities: If there are 10 or more cards in your Break Zone, the ~Card Name Seifer~ Forward and the ~Job Disciplinary Committee Member~ Forwards you control gain +2000 power and *First Strike*.
When Fujin enters the field, put the top 2 cards of your deck into the Break Zone.
When Fujin is put from the deck into the Break Zone, you may play Fujin from your Break Zone onto the field.
